amendment.description: To delay until September 30, 2007, the limitation on the procurement by the Department of Defense of systems that are not equipped with the Global Positioning System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2491 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2491 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12592) To delay until September 30, 2007, the limitation on the procurement by the Department of Defense of systems that are not equipped with the Global Positioning System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2491 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2491 proposed by Senator Warner.
